#summary A look at cell tables and trees.

= Introduction =

GWT has added [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/doc/latest/DevGuideUiCellWidgets.html cell widgets] to allow higher performance rendering of larger datasets.

= Details =

Similar to Swing concepts, there are renderers and models to hold the data.  Here is a screenshot of how the designer handles a table with several columns:
